body_html:
I just noticed that Iterator.get_next() did not change my batch samples in a tf.while_loop.

Can you explain what you actually tried? If the get_next() op is created inside the while loop body, it should advance in each iteration.

body:
> I just noticed that Iterator.get_next() did not change my batch samples in a tf.while_loop.

Can you explain what you actually tried? If the `get_next()` op is created inside the while loop body, it should advance in each iteration.
